about_the_game: Battle for Ercaton: Robot Uprising is a first-person shooter where the player takes on the role of an earthling who crashed a spaceship and ended up on the planet Ercaton. Once upon a time, Ercaton was a prosperous planet with an advanced civilization, but now it is an abandoned place dominated by dangerous robots created by the former inhabitants. These artificial creatures are out of control and have taken over the planet. Your goal is to free Ercaton from the tyranny of the robots and find a way to return to Earth. You'll face battles with many robots, each of which has its own characteristics. You will need all your skills to defeat them. Are you ready to stand up to the machine uprising?
